subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Ryan Smyth had been in New York for only a few hours when the Hall of Famer Mike Bossy called to welcome Smyth, the former Edmonton Oilers star, to the Islanders.
snippet: Ryan Smyth had been in New York for only a few hours when the Hall of Famer Mike Bossy called to welcome Smyth, the former Edmonton Oilers star, to the Islanders.
